title: Mars Transit in the 7th House for Capricorn Ascendant
summary: When Mars transits the 7th house for Capricorn Ascendant, partnerships, marriage, and one-to-one dealings become highly charged with assertive energy. You may feel compelled to dominate negotiations or push relationships toward decisive outcomes. Passion and intensity rise, but impatience can spark conflicts with partners, clients, or collaborators. This phase favors bold business alliances and clear boundary-setting when handled maturely. Balance is achieved by practicing restraint and cooperation, allowing Marsâ€™ drive to strengthen partnerships rather than strain them.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Desire to take control in partnerships

sections.title: Career
points: Aggressive approach to deals and contracts

closing: This Mars transit tests Capricorn Ascendants in partnerships. Controlled assertiveness turns conflict into productive collaboration.
